oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bioactive berry phenolics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heinonen, Marina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Compositional data on phenolic compounds in berries has been rapidly accumulating and readily included in the national food composition data base. Among the different bioactive substances in berries, phenolic compounds including flavonoids, tannins, and phenolic acids have received considerable interest due to their effects in food and health.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Heinonen, Marina (2007) Bioactive berry phenolics. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, p. 8.
